name: Verify unsuccessful booking of a table for an invalid table id

steps.name: Given the waiter is logged in
When the waiter sends a POST request to the end point for booking a table "table-999" for "5" people from "<timeFrom>" to "19:00" at location "location-002" and for customer "David Jack"
Then the response status code must be 400
